dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Sent via: Fax and Email

To
Mr. Alexander Macgillivray
Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Building 47, Mountain View
CA 94043

April 13, 2007

Attn: AdSense Support, DMCA complaints

Dear Mr. Alexander Macgillivray,

At the outset we would like to mention that our organization has invested lot of capital, labor and intellectual skills for the creation of the contents (text and images) of the site and these contents are being indigenously developed by us. The content of the site is original and it has been put in by the creative efforts of the employees of the company. We are exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the contents of the website http://www.christmascarnivals.com/. Moreover, the commercial, non-permitted copying of our content and lay-out is not even covered under the Fair Use provisions. Therefore, as required under section 512 (c) (3) and section 512 (d) (3) of the Digital Millenium Copyright Act, 1998 (17 U.S.C. 512 (c) (3) and 512 (d) (3)), we are instructed to place you on notice that:

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.christmascarnivals.com/. It was created on December 16, 1999. Thereafter we have been adding 40-50 pages of original content everyday resulting in the website having close to 20,000 pages at present. It is one of our most important site till date. It is pertinent to mention here that many pages of the said website were copied verbatim without any fail. We are providing here URLs of just 20 pages to avoid making the document lengthy.

1. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-wreaths/
2. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-wreaths/christmas-card-wreaths.html
3. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-wreaths.balsam-christmas-wreaths.html
4. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-flowers/
5. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-wedding/christmas-wedding-flowers.html
6. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-flower-arrangement/
7. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/crafts/
8. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-myths/
9. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-angels/
10. http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-legends/
11.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-legends/christmas-spider-legends.html
12.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-home/
13.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-skiing/
14.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-lights/
15.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-lights/led-christmas-lights.html
16.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-vacation/
17.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-vacation/christmas-vacations-in-usa.html
18.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-vacation/christmas-vacations-in-alabama.html
19.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-party-games/christmas-game-kid-party.html
20.  http://www.christmascarnivals.com/christmas-balloons/

2. The material that is infringing upon our copyright in clause (1) is hosted on http://www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com. Here we are providing links of just 20 such pages to do away with making the document too lengthy. The proof of their copying can be specifically found at the URLs www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Wreaths and www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Lights wherein the last line serves as the smoking gun. It is pertinent to mention here that the list given below corresponds to the pages sited above, that is, #10 URL is violating the content of #10 URL above.

1. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Wreaths
2. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Wreaths
3. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Wreaths
4. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Flowers	
5. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Flowers
6. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Flowers
7. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/2006/12/christmas-crafts.html
8. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/christmas-legends.html
9. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Angels
10. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Legends
11. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Legends
12. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Vacations
13. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/2006/12/christmas-skiing.html
14. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Lights
16. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Vacations
17. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Vacations
18. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/search/label/Christmas-Vacations
19. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/2006/12/christmas-game-kid-party.html
20. www.christmasgiftsidea.blogspot.com/2006/12/christmas-balloons.html

3. For any queries or clarifications you can contact us at simar@infobase.in. Alternatively you can also send a regular mail to our Corporate Office on the following address: 

Compare Infobase Limited
C-62, Janak Community Centre,
Janak Puri
New Delhi-110 058 (India)
Tel: +91-11-51588012, 25542045
Telefax: +91-11-25547264

4. Since the infringing material has been posted on the subdomain of google's blogspot.com, the contact details of the infringing website, as obtained from the whois records are same as that of Google's, that is:

DNS Admin (NIC - 1467103) Google Inc. [dns-admin@google.com]
1660 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View
CA 94043 US

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours Truly

Simarprit Singh
Compare Infobase Limited
C-62, 2nd Floor
Janak Cinema Complex,
Janakpuri, New Delhi - 110058
India
simar@infobase.in
